0 10000001 11110000000000000000000

+ 129      15

129 = e + 127
129-127 = e
e = 2

+ x.y x 2^2   

+ 1.y x 2^2
+ 1.15 x 2^2

32 = 2^5
exponent = 5
biased exponent    = 127 + 5
